Watershed Protectors
The Ipswich River provides drinking water to 14 communities along its path, 
impacting a population of 350,000 residents and businesses, including our 
global headquarters site in Wilmington, MA. Our long-standing partnership 
helps provide much needed funds and volunteers to Ipswich River Watershed 
Association, which brings together citizens, scientists, businesses and 
municipal managers to work together to protect and restore the watershed.
